title: S4 Ep41: The robots are reshoring!
itunes:title: The robots are reshoring!
description: Robots and offshoring are blamed for destroying manufacturing jobs in advanced economies. But could automation also be a way to make domestic manufacturing more competitive? If so, those outsourced jobs may return. Alessandra Bonfiglioli tells Tim Phillips why there may be reasons to welcome our new robot overlords.
itunes:author: VoxTalks
dc:creator: VoxTalks
